alert.note: Alert for Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 1:19PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of one to three tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Northern St. Lawrence and Northern Franklin Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday morning commute with poor visibilities and snow covered roads. A few power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain mixed with sleet and freezing rain will develop this evening and change to all snow by early Friday morning. A period of moderate to heavy snow is expected on Friday morning before tapering off to snow showers by Friday evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.
